name: gallery-component-07
description: Infinite scrolling marquee gallery with dual-direction rows, pause on hover functionality, gradient edge fades, and continuous animation showcasing images in opposite scrolling directions

files.content:

]

const GalleryPage = () => {
  return <Gallery data={galleryImages} />
}

export default GalleryPage
